segment.source: Applications Node in Server Management Console
segment.target: Applications Node in Server Management Console

segment.source: Applications Node in Server Management Console
segment.target: Applications Node in Server Management Console

segment.source: Applications Node in Server Management Console
segment.target: Applications Node in Server Management Console

segment.source: The Applications node is one level below the Application Virtualization System node in the Scope pane.
segment.target: The Applications node is one level below the Application Virtualization System node in the Scope pane.

segment.source: When you select this node, the Results pane displays a list of applications.
segment.target: When you select this node, the Results pane displays a list of applications.

segment.source: Right-click the Applications node to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements:
segment.target: Right-click the Applications node to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements:

segment.source: New Application Group
segment.target: New Application Group

segment.source: Displays the New Application Group Wizard.
segment.target: Displays the New Application Group Wizard.

segment.source: New Application
segment.target: New Application

segment.source: Displays the New Application Wizard.
segment.target: Displays the New Application Wizard.

segment.source: Import Applications
segment.target: Import Applications

segment.source: Imports Open Software Descriptor (OSD) files or Sequencer Project (SPRJ) files.
segment.target: Imports Open Software Descriptor (OSD) files or Sequencer Project (SPRJ) files.

segment.source: New Window from Here
segment.target: New Window from Here

segment.source: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.
segment.target: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.

segment.source: Refresh
segment.target: Refresh

segment.source: Refreshes the view of the server.
segment.target: Refreshes the view of the server.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Management Console.
segment.target: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Management Console.

segment.source: When you right-click any application group that appears under the Applications node in the Scope pane, the following additional elements are available.
segment.target: When you right-click any application group that appears under the Applications node in the Scope pane, the following additional elements are available.

segment.source: View
segment.target: View

segment.source: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.
segment.target: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.

segment.source: Move
segment.target: Move

segment.source: Moves the application to another application group.
segment.target: Moves the application to another application group.

segment.source: Copy
segment.target: Copy

segment.source: Copies an application to a new Application Virtualization System.
segment.target: Copies an application to a new Application Virtualization System.

segment.source: Delete
segment.target: Delete

segment.source: Deletes an application.
segment.target: Deletes an application.

segment.source: Rename
segment.target: Rename

segment.source: Renames an application.
segment.target: Renames an application.

segment.source: Export List
segment.target: Export List

segment.source: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.
segment.target: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.

segment.source: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.
segment.target: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: How to Manually Add an Application
segment.target: How to Manually Add an Application
